completeness_review.notes: System meets all SOEN422 requirements but can be enhanced for robustness, security, and evaluation.

additions: Wi-Fi reconnect loop with exponential backoff
Server timeout handling and retry queue for offline cache sync
Sensor fault detection (RFID/OLED init failure handling)
Enable HTTPS with TLS (accepts self-signed certificates)
Explicit schema definitions for users, rfids, and entries tables
Define policy enforcement rules (e.g., max entries per time window)
Add admin audit endpoints and log retention strategy
